GameUI
MonoBehaviour
public
GameUI

Manages the user interface (UI) of the game.

Variables
coinsGameObject
[SerializeField]
GameObject coinsGameObject

Game object representing the coins value.

bestScoreGameObject
[SerializeField]
GameObject bestScoreGameObject

Game object representing best score.

scoreGameObject
[SerializeField]
GameObject scoreGameObject

Game object representing current score.

startGame
[SerializeField]
GameObject startGame

Game object representing the start game button.

purchasePanel
[SerializeField]
GameObject purchasePanel

Game object representing the purchase panel

settingsPanel
[SerializeField]
GameObject settingsPanel

Game object representing the settings panel.

pausePanel
[SerializeField]
GameObject pausePanel

Game object representing the pause panel.

pauseButton
[SerializeField]
GameObject pauseButton

Game object representing the pause button.

mainMenuButton
[SerializeField]
GameObject mainMenuButton

Game object representing the main menu button.

helpPanel
[SerializeField]
GameObject helpPanel

Game object representing the help panel.

helpButton
[SerializeField]
GameObject helpButton

Game object representing the help button.

alert
[SerializeField]
ModalDialog alert

Modal dialog object

countdownText
[SerializeField]
Text countdownText

Text object for countdown

newPersonalBestAnimator
[SerializeField]
Animator newPersonalBestAnimator
Functions
Start
private void Start()

Activated when the object is initialized.

Update
private void Update()

Called every frame.

PlayAgain
public void PlayAgain()

Starts the game again.

MainMenu
public void MainMenu()

Goes back to the main menu.

OpenSettings
public void OpenSettings()

Opens the settings panel.

CloseSettings
public void CloseSettings()

Closes the settings panel.

OpenHelp
public void OpenHelp()

Opens the help panel.

CloseHelp
public void CloseHelp()

Closes the help panel.

PauseGame
public void PauseGame()

Pauses the game.

ResumeGame
public void ResumeGame()

Resumes the game after a countdown.

CountdownCoroutine
IEnumerator CountdownCoroutine()

Coroutine for the countdown before resuming the game.

PlayNewPersonalBest
public void PlayNewPersonalBest()
Click
private void Click()

Plays a button click sound and handles related actions.
